alert.note: Alert for Banner (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 7:13AM CDT until March 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches expected. * WHERE...In Southeast Wyoming, South Laramie Range Foothills, central and eastern Laramie County including the cities of Cheyenne and Pine Bluffs. In Nebraska, Banner, Kimball, Cheyenne Counties including the cities of Harrisburg, Kimball, and Sidney. The highest accumulations are expected across Laramie County in Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. The heaviest snow is expected this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick, snow covered roads and low visibilities in falling snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
